  • Method Details

    • create

      public static Formant create​(double tmin, double tmax, long nt, double dt, double t1, int maxnFormants) throws PraatException
      Function: return a new instance of Formant, or NULL if out of memory. Preconditions: nt >= 1; dt > 0.0; maxnFormants >= 1; Postconditions: my xmin = tmin; my xmax = tmax; my nx = nt; my dx = dt; my x1 = t1; my maximumNumberOfPairs == maxnFormants; my frames [1..nt]. intensity == 0.0; my frames [1..nt]. numberOfPairs == 0; my frames [1..nt]. formants [1..maxnFormants] = 0.0; my frames [1..nt]. bandwidths [1..maxnFormants] = 0.0;
      Throws:
      PraatException
